name: @remitano-anhdt/kyc-sdk
description: Typescript SDK to interact with Kyc program.
author: anhdt@remitano.com

scripts.test: export TS_JEST_DISABLE_VER_CHECKER=true && export JEST_JUNIT_OUTPUT_DIR=reports && npx jest --verbose --coverage --coverageProvider=v8 --collectCoverage=true --runInBand --reporters=default --reporters=jest-junit
